attributes.action: Mediate with Myanmar Tatmadaw and CRPH to negotiate peace
attributes.additional_details:
1948 former British Colony Myanmar (Burma) gains Independence.
Democracy leads to countrywide ethnic unrest.
Military Dictatorship 1962 - Tatmadaw protecting Union of Myanmar.
People endure poverty and inadequate conditions.
until 2010 USDP Transition to Democracy.
Nov 2015 NLD election victory. 5 years Democracy and change.
Nov 2020 NLD election win. No USDP gains..
Tatmadaw recount demand denied.
Feb 1 2021 NLD leaders arrested. Tatmadaw one-year takeover.
People protest peacefully.
Feb 28 military crackdown.
CRPH - former NLD lawmakers strive to create
new unified party and peaceful settlement

UN and international community call for end to violence.
Daily coverage - see The Irrawaddy online news magazine
attributes.background: Support CRPH (Committee Representing Pyidaungsu Hluttaw) endeavour to create new unified democratic party
